DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether patients with obstructive sleep apnea have any changes in right ventricular function evaluated by three dimensional echocardiography.
DOC.brief_title: Right Ventricular Function in Patients With Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.detailed_description: Several studies have reported the association between sleep disorders to an increased risk to the development of cardiac disease. However, there is no substantial that about the influence of Obstructive Sleep Apnea on the right ventricular function. Objective: to analyse the right ventricular function in patients with Obstructive Sleep Apnea by means of Real-Time Three dimensional Echocardiography.
DOC.criteria: Individuals > 18 years old and < 70. Body mass index greater than 35 Past of clinically significant cardiac conditions
